commitMessage:
fix: make all CLI commands non-interactive and status read-only (HODGE-281)

## What Changed
- Removed interactive prompt from `hodge status` command (71 lines removed)
- Removed PR creation functionality from `hodge ship` command (138 lines removed)
- Made `status` command read-only by removing HODGE.md update functionality
- Added critical CLI architecture standard requiring non-interactive commands
- Created smoke tests for status command non-interactive behavior

## Why This Change
Hodge CLI commands are exclusively called by Claude Code slash commands, never
directly by developers. Interactive prompts were blocking execution and causing
errors. The status command was violating read-only principles by updating files.

## Impact
- ✅ All CLI commands now work correctly from slash commands
- ✅ Status command is truly read-only (no side effects)
- ✅ Removed ~200 lines of unnecessary PR creation code
- ✅ Improved architectural clarity and consistency
- ✅ Tests verify non-interactive behavior

## Technical Details
- Removed inquirer prompts from status.ts and ship.ts
- Deleted handlePRCreation method and all PR-related imports
- Status no longer calls updateHodgeMD() or modifies any files
- Added .hodge/standards.md enforcement of non-interactive requirement

Closes HODGE-281
